acceptanceCriteria.criterion: ResumeBasics interface includes: name, label, email, phone, url?, location, profiles, summary
WorkExperience interface includes: company, position, startDate, endDate?, highlights
Education interface includes: institution, area, studyType, startDate, endDate?
Language interface includes: language, fluency (union type)
Certification interface includes: name, issuer, date
Resume interface combines all above with optional languages/certifications
All date fields use YYYY-MM string format

constraints.constraint: Based on JSON Resume standard (modified) - see Architecture doc
Date fields must use YYYY-MM string format (not Date object)
Resume data must be independent from portfolio data (FR3)
Must support future language extension via file naming (resume.{locale}.ts)
All interfaces must be exported for use in components
